Milinda.

I am Milinda Pathirage, a computer science PhD student interested in distributed stream processing systems and programming abstractions for distributed systems and stream processing. I write a blog here about interesting things related to research I am doing, programming and technology in general. I live in Bloomington, Indiana with my daughter and wife. You can find my resume here.
